== Joining the Team ==
*** Abide by the rules defined on the <nowiki>[[UnansweredPostsTeam-Rules|Team Rules]]</nowiki>.
*** Moderate understanding of Ubuntu and/or Linux.
*** Be an active participant in the team for at least a month.
*** You can be active in the team by hanging out in our IRC channel, <nowiki>[[irc:--irc.freenode.net-ubuntuforums-unanswered|#ubuntuforums-unanswered]]</nowiki> on irc.freenode.net.
*** Registered forum member for at least 6 months.

=== Got a question? ===
If you have any questions about the joining process, feel free to ask the team in our IRC channel or launch an email off to the team leader.
